thread.title: Lee DeLorenzo Quoted in Financial Advisor Magazine on Volatility
thread.title_full: Lee DeLorenzo Quoted in Financial Advisor Magazine on Volatility

author: Lee DeLorenzo
title: Lee DeLorenzo Quoted in Financial Advisor Magazine on Volatility
text: Lee DeLorenzo, President of United Asset Strategies, Inc. and one of Barron’s 2015 Top 100 Women Financial Advisors has been interviewed and Quote: d in the August 27, 2015 edition of Financial Advisors Magazine. Lee says that from a technical perspective, the market was poised to break out. “I had forecasted increased volatility since the beginning of the year and had written to our client base about it,” she says. “The volatility was not only historically below average, but it had also become range-bound, which is always the indication of a coming breakout. The chance of a breakout to the upside was lower than the chance for a breakout to the downside.” Lee’s insights and recommendations regarding volatility and cash flow planning can be found in the full article by clicking here .
